name: Data Engineer (Cloud Team)
description:
Big Data Solutions is a product company developing highly loaded systems for analyzing trading results in financial markets.

We are providing market data (our data sets encompass largest exchanges around the world) and TCA metrics, which could be used for quantitative research, surveillance and back-testing. In order to have our product distributed and provided to our Customers in time we have large cloud infrastructure (part of it is in on-prem data center, part - in AWS and we continue the migration).

Our product is a fairly complex enterprise platform with a wide range of capabilities and features. Now we are looking for DataBase Developers to join international project (colleagues in Russia, USA and Armenia).

Responsibilities:

  • Development of data requests (queries) for the Customers (OneTick query language is used), while managing the whole query life cycle, including production support.
  • Helping Operations team by developing queries for Operations support.
  • Helping to merge business branches on the basis of OneTick query language.
  • Defining and setting performance benchmarks for the queries in the Cloud environment.
  • Introducing best development practices, including job orchestration for queries.
  • Scripts to do log analysis in support of customer and product attribution.

Technical requirements:

  • Knowledge of basic algorithms and data structures. The ability to evaluate spatial and temporal complexity.
  • Experience with SQL and data normalization or deep knowledge of computer science.
  • Confident work with Linux.
  • Programming skills with one of commonly used programming language (Python is preferable).

General requirements:

  • Ability to learn the programming language, specific to the financial area.
  • English - good writing and speaking skills.

Nice to have:

  • Experience in the financial market.

  • Understanding the principles of the operating system on the example of Linux.
  • Experience with time-series databases

We have great benefits:

  • 31 Days Holidays.

  • Flexible working hours.

  • Medical insurance for employees and their families.

  • Travel insurance.

  • English classes.

  • Regular performance reviews.

  • Lunch benefit.

  • Remote work till the end of the year
